trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"></xref> class.
Copies each <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> object in the collection to an array, starting from the specified index.
An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> objects in the collection are copied to.
The position in the collection to start copying from.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"></xref>.
The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"></xref>.
Returns an <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that you can use to enumerate the <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> objects in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that you can use to enumerate the <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"></xref> object is thread safe.
**true** if the object is thread safe; otherwise, **false**.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> object at the specified index.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> object.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.WindowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.
